chapters.title: Chapter 5:  The Forging of a Hammer
chapters.info: Annoura Larisen, p. 179 (205)—Aes Sedai of the Gray Ajah with a broad face, wide mouth, and a beak of a nose. She keeps her long dark hair in braids. She grew up in Tarabon. She serves as advisor to Berelain sur Paendrag, the First of Mayene. See also sur Paendrag Paeron, Berelain.
